# Welcome to the Robinson Lab!

We are located in the [Institute of Molecular Life Sciences](http://www.imls.uzh.ch/en.html) within the [Faculty of Science](http://www.mnf.uzh.ch/en.html) at the [University of Zurich](http://www.uzh.ch/en.html).

Research in our laboratory is focused on statistical methods and data science tools for processing and interpreting genomic data. You can learn about [our research](research.html), [who we are](people.html), the [resources](tools.html) we make or the [papers](publications.html) we publish.
